name: This is Fine (Fine Equipe)
description:
THIS IS FINE CONTROLS :

WASD move

SPACE jump

TAB change tool (extinguisher --> fire / welder --> electricty)

SHIFT sprint

Mouse Click action

E open doors

You are in big trouble. And this is NOT fine.

Play as a cosmo-guy who needs to fix on several random hazards aboard his spaceship  by realizing  and managing multiple tasks.

This project was realised for the ZenoJam 2021 by :

  • Blauenzag (dev)
  • Blast (sound design) : https://blast-sd.itch.io/
  • NeroTek (music / sound desing) : https://twitter.com/NeroTek_?s=20
  • Akitann (3D props) : https://www.artstation.com/berlioz
  • Daaxter (3D props) : https://www.artstation.com/daaxter
  • PoogieGuy (3D props) : https://www.artstation.com/julesdecossas
